content: this legal text discusses the progress of a case involving the division of a community property inheritance the plaintiff who is the niece of the deceased filed a lawsuit against the defendants who are the children of the deceaseds predeceased sister the parties attempted to settle the case outside of court but were unsuccessful the plaintiff requested the division of the inherited property and the lawful succession of the deceaseds estate the court appointed an expert witness to assess the value of the assets and create a divisional plan after several hearings and discussions the court approved the divisional plan and allocated the assets to the parties the defendants were ordered to pay the plaintiff a sum of money including interest and cover the costs of the proceedings the court also explained the legal principles and procedures involved in dividing community property in this case the court has made a final decision declaring the legitimate succession of the deceased and determining the properties that belong to the estate the court has approved a division plan for the joint estate assigning specific assets to the plaintiff and defendants the defendants have been ordered to pay the plaintiff a certain amount of money plus interest the court dismissed a request for reckless litigation and ordered the costs of the proceedings to be paid by the estate additionally the defendants have been ordered to contribute to the state budget

metadata.relationship_between_parties: nephews and sister of the deceased
